ans = [(1<<31)-1] * n

from collections import defaultdict
R = defaultdict(list)

for _ in range(T):

            for j in R[i]:

                    can_remove = False
            if can_remove:
                ans[i] ^= mask

print(" ".join(str(x)for x in ans)+"\n")

input, print = stdin.buffer.readline, stdout.write

n, T = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

ans = [(1<<31)-1] * n

from collections import defaultdict
R = defaultdict(list)

for _ in range(T):
    a, b, x = [int(_a) for _a in input().split()]
    a -= 1
    b -= 1
    a, b = min(a, b), max(a, b)
    ans[a] &= x
    ans[b] &= x
    R[a].append(b)
    R[b].append(a)

        mask = 1 << b
        if mask & ans[i]:
            can_remove = True
            for j in R[i]:

                    can_remove = False
            if can_remove:
                ans[i] ^= mask
